body_html:
I don't think it's wise to close this issue as it affects many.

For me, adding
cxx_flag: "-D_MWAITXINTRIN_H_INCLUDED" in tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL
fixed the problem.

Additionally, it is unproblematic to install cuda toolkit with gcc 5.3 on ubuntu 16.04 - just install with the override option.

What I fear are performance issues, but I don't know if they exist.

body:
I don't think it's wise to close this issue as it affects many. 

For me, adding
`cxx_flag: "-D_MWAITXINTRIN_H_INCLUDED"` in tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL
fixed the problem.

Additionally, it is unproblematic to install cuda toolkit with gcc 5.3 on ubuntu 16.04 - just install with the override option.

What I fear are performance issues, but I don't know if they exist.
